item.title: Findwindow procedure and scar space problem, help plz
item.dc:creator: @bonoon bonoon
item.description:
@bonoon wrote:

I made a script, that a site refreshed, afther that, scar gives an ‘canvas not allowing drawing error’, so I think i need to activate the client window again. I found this procedure to fix it:

procedure canvas;

var
Start new topic - Mozilla Firefox: string;

begin
if FindWindow(Start new topic - Mozilla Firefox)
then begin activateclient;
end else
writeln(‘They own us, but not for long’);
end;

(problem is scar does not allow spaces between words, so he gives errors, someone got an solution or idea ?

Ty Bonoon

Read full topic
item.source: Findwindow procedure and scar space problem, help plz
